Text: This is a great movie i'd been looking all over for a good copy of. Cheers!
The audio is way out of synch on this... picture quality isn't great in places, either, but the sound was the real killer. Their mouths are moving & the sound comes a few seconds later. :-(
i found a great copy of this on btjunkie, not that im badmouthing the bay cause this is my main :D
audio is great. nothing out of sync, and the video is fine too. the btjunkie's copy is 653MB, same as here. could it be the same as this one?
thanks you legend, ive been after another copy of this film for years :)
Not wanting to 'piss on everyone's bonfire', but this is way out of sync. Good movie, shame about the sound that's all. Always appreciate the effort though!
